weapons.name: Absorb+
weapons.description: Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.<br>After combat, if unit attacked, restores 7 HP to allies within 2 spaces of unit.

weapons.name: Candlelight
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status on foe preventing counterattacks through its next action.

weapons.name: Candlelight+
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status on target and foes within 2 spaces of target preventing counterattacks through their next actions.

weapons.name: Fear
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk-6 on foe through its next action.

weapons.name: Fear+
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

weapons.name: Gravity
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status on foe restricting movement to 1 space through its next action.

weapons.name: Gravity+
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts status on foe restricting movement to 1 space through its next action.

weapons.name: Pain
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, deals 10 damage to foe.

weapons.name: Pain+
weapons.description: Deals 10 damage to target and foes within 2 spaces of target after combat.

weapons.name: Panic
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, converts bonuses on foe into penalties through its next action.

weapons.name: Panic+
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, converts bonuses on target and foes within 2 spaces of target into penalties through their next actions.

weapons.name: Slow
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Spd-6 on foe through its next action.

weapons.name: Slow+
weapons.description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

assists.name: Martyr
assists.description: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Restores X HP to target (X = damage dealt to unit + 7). Restores Y HP to unit (Y = half damage dealt to unit).

assists.name: Martyr+
assists.description: Restores HP = damage dealt to unit +50% of Atk. (Minimum of 7 HP.) Restores HP to unit = half damage dealt to unit.

assists.name: Physic
assists.description: Restores 8 HP to target ally. Range = 2.

assists.name: Physic+
assists.description: Restores HP = 50% of Atk. (Minimum of 8 HP.) Range = 2.

assists.name: Reconcile
assists.description: Restores 7 HP to unit and target ally.

assists.name: Recover
assists.description: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). Restores 15 HP to target ally.

assists.name: Recover+
assists.description: Restores HP = 50% of Atk +10. (Minimum of 15 HP.)

assists.name: Rehabilitate
assists.description: Slows Special trigger (cooldown count+1). If target's HP is ≤ 50%, the lower the target's HP, the more HP is restored. (Minimum of 7 HP.)

assists.name: Rehabilitate+
assists.description: Restores HP = 50% of Atk -10. (Minimum of 7 HP.) If target's HP is ≤ 50%, the lower the target's HP, the more HP is restored.

specials.name: Heavenly Light
specials.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores 10 HP to all allies.

specials.name: Imbue
specials.description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores an additional 10 HP to target ally.

specials.name: Miracle
specials.description: If unit's HP > 1 and foe would reduce unit's HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP.

B.name: Guard 1
B.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

B.name: Guard 2
B.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 90%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

B.name: Guard 3
B.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 80%, inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

B.name: Wrath 1
B.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

B.name: Wrath 2
B.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 50% and unit's attack can trigger their Special, grants Special cooldown count-1, and deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

B.name: Wrath 3

B.name: Obstruct 1

B.name: Obstruct 2
B.description: If unit's HP ≥ 70%, foes cannot move through spaces adjacent to unit. (Does not affect foes with Pass skills.)

B.name: Obstruct 3

B.name: Dazzling Staff 1

B.name: Dazzling Staff 2
B.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50%, foe cannot counterattack.

B.name: Dazzling Staff 3
B.description: Foe cannot counterattack.

B.name: Wrathful Staff 1

B.description: At start of combat, if unit's HP = 100%, calculates damage from staff like other weapons.

B.name: Wrathful Staff 3

B.name: Vantage 3
